questions.quote: Is this a waste of time? What should we be doing? Can't you have coffee with people?
Yes! You don't understand. I'm living with Ethel Merman without the talent.
You can't be serious. This is New York city. There must be eleven million decent hotel rooms! Whatta you need? A flag?  This is the signal, Jerry, this is the signal!
They're a crazy religious cult. The carpet cleaning is just a means for them to get into your apartment.
No no no no no, this has to be carefully orchestrated. You go to a fancy dinner, flowers...
Our policy is, we're comfortable with our bodies. You know, if someone wants to help themselves to an eyefull, well, we say, 'Enjoy the show.'
Last time I had lunch with you here. You were going *on* and *on* and *on* about how you wanted to meet somebody who didn't speak English.
Hey, you're not talking that Michigan deposit bottle scam again, are you?
By the time the race was over I had won. I was shocked nobody had noticed the head start.
The whole city is talking about this monster Joel Rifkin, and I am dating a Joel Rifkin.
